DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : POLITICS : IRA LEADER TO SPEAK
DOC.TEXT: Gerry Adams , leader of Sinn Fein , the political wing of the_Irish Republican Army , will speak in Los Angeles on Friday . Sponsored by the Los Angeles World Affairs Council , the luncheon will be held at noon at the Century Plaza Hotel in Century City . Adams is_on a tour of the United States to promote peace talks between the_British government and the IRA , which has been fighting for 25 years to end British rule of Northern_Ireland . For ticket information : ( 213 ) 628-2333 .
